00023 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00024         if(argc != 2) printUsage(); 
00025 
00026         setupLogs(1, LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, DEFAULT_OUTPUT_FILENAME);
00027         setupMemory();
00028         setupDisplay(argc, argv);
00029 
00030         unsigned char programBuffer[512];
00031         int len = readCartridge(argv[1], programBuffer);
00032         write(DATA_SPACE_START, programBuffer, len);
00033
